title: Submit a Self Employment Business' Accounting Adjustments
description: This endpoint allows the user to provide accounting adjustments against a specified Business Source Accounting Summary quoting its unique identifier. The BSAS ID quoted must be for a Self Employment Business and it must not have been adjusted, previously.

income.description: An object containing the adjustments to the Income values.

turnover.description: The adjustment to takings, fees, sales or money earned by your business. Income associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

other.description: The adjustment to any other business income not included in turnover. Income associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

expenses.description: An object containing the adjustments to the Expenses values.

costOfGoodsBought.description: The adjustment to the cost of goods bought for resale or goods used. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

cisPaymentsToSubcontractors.description: The adjustment to payments to subcontractors - Construction Industry Scheme (CIS). Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

staffCosts.description: The adjustment to wages, salaries and other staff costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

travelCosts.description: The adjustment to car, van and travel expenses. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

premisesRunningCosts.description: The adjustment to rent, rates, power and insurance costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

maintenanceCosts.description: The adjustment to repairs and renewals of property and equipment. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

adminCosts.description: The adjustment to phone, fax, stationery and other office costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

advertisingCosts.description: The adjustment to advertising costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

businessEntertainmentCosts.description: The adjustment to business entertainment costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

interest.description: The adjustment to interest on bank and other loans. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

financialCharges.description: The adjustment to bank, credit card and other financial charges. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

badDebt.description: The adjustment to irrecoverable debts written off. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

professionalFees.description: The adjustment to accountancy, legal and other professional fees. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

depreciation.description: The adjustment to depreciation and loss/profit on sales of assets. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

other.description: The adjustment to other expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

consolidatedExpenses.description: The adjustment to the sum of all expenses for the specified period. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

additions.description: A breakdown of the adjustable additions for the accounting period.

costOfGoodsBoughtDisallowable.description: The adjustment to cost of goods bought for resale or goods used. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

cisPaymentsToSubcontractorsDisallowable.description: The adjustment to payments to subcontractors - Construction Industry Scheme (CIS). Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

staffCostsDisallowable.description: The adjustment to wages, salaries and other staff costs. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

travelCostsDisallowable.description: The adjustment to car, van and travel expenses. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

premisesRunningCostsDisallowable.description: The adjustment to rent, rates, power and insurance costs. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

maintenanceCostsDisallowable.description: The adjustment to repairs and renewals of property and equipment. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

adminCostsDisallowable.description: The adjustment to phone, fax, stationery and other office costs. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

advertisingCostsDisallowable.description: The adjustment to advertising costs. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

businessEntertainmentCostsDisallowable.description: The adjustment to business entertainment costs. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

interestDisallowable.description: The adjustment to interest on bank and other loans. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

financialChargesDisallowable.description: The adjustment to bank, credit card and other financial charges. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

badDebtDisallowable.description: The adjustment to irrecoverable debts written off. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

professionalFeesDisallowable.description: The adjustment to accountancy, legal and other professional fees. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

depreciationDisallowable.description: The adjustment to depreciation and loss/profit on sales of assets. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

otherDisallowable.description: The adjustment to any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
